name: Lolth’s Embrace
description: "Grasping like a web. Deep as a cavern. Permanent as death." This Underdark Black D10 die pendant is carefully hand drilled at its vertex then tightly hand bound and woven with sterling silver wire. It swings from a skull that is entangled by a heart shaped spider web on a 16”-18” long adjustable chain with a lobster claw clasp and spider charm at back. Handcrafted, one of a kind, made with mixed metals and sterling silver. * Within the US, this item will be shipped USPS First Class Mail with Delivery Confirmation. *To Canada & Everywhere else, this item will be shipped USPS Priority Mail International with Insurance. Refunds and Exchanges All requests for returns and exchanges must be made and shipped back within 15 days of receiving your order (buyer is responsible for shipping costs). It is my aim, to make your experience buying my art a happy one! If there is an issue with anything, please contact me and we can discuss the best way to solve the problem. Your items are packaged very carefully and securely to ensure they arrive safely & intact. See more Art Jewelry and Charisma Modifiers on my Google+ Photo Gallery
